vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἐλιούδ, ὁ
indecl.,
Eliud, an ancestor of Jesus: Mat.1:14-15.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, first mentioned at Mat.1.14;
son of: Achim (G0885);
father of: Eleazar (G1648)
§ Eliud, "God [El] is [my] grandeur"
Eliud the father of Eleazar, Mt. 1:14, 15*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以律 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "上帝的讚美"
基督的家譜裡, 亞金的兒子 (太 1:14,15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以律 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "上帝的赞美"
基督的家谱里, 亚金的儿子 (太 1:14,15)
